title: Slay Vocal Complete - Advanced Lung & Larynx Health Support for Singers - 60 Capsules
descriptionHtml:
Support your vocal health with Slay Vocal Complete by Success Chemistry. This advanced formula combines essential vitamins, minerals, and organic ingredients tailored for singers and vocal professionals. Designed to enhance vocal performance, reduce vocal strain, and promote overall respiratory health, it provides the nutrients needed for a strong, healthy voice, whether you're singing, speaking, or performing. Key Benefits:
  • Enhances Vocal Performance: Supports vocal strength and endurance for optimal performance.
  • Reduces Vocal Strain: Minimizes fatigue, allowing longer, powerful performances.
  • Supports Respiratory Health: Promotes lung health and improves respiratory function.
  • Promotes Larynx Health: Ensures a clear and robust voice.
  • Organic and Natural: Formulated with organic ingredients for safe, effective support.
Ingredients Include:
  • Organic Wheatgrass Powder: Rich in vitamins for overall health.
  • Organic Moringa Leaf Powder: Provides antioxidants for respiratory support.
  • Organic Spirulina Powder: Supports immune and respiratory health.
  • Organic Ashwagandha Powder: Reduces stress and promotes well-being.
  • Bacillus Coagulans: A probiotic supporting gut health.
Why Choose Slay Vocal Complete?
  • High-Quality, Organic Ingredients: Premium blend for vocal and respiratory health.
  • Natural and Safe: Free from artificial additives and allergens.
  • Comprehensive Support: Benefits include enhanced performance and respiratory health.
  • Convenient and Effective: 60 easy-to-swallow capsules for a one-month supply.
Achieve optimal vocal health and performance with Slay Vocal Complete by Success Chemistry!

Incorporate Success Chemistry's Slay Vocal Complete into your daily routine to support your vocal health and enhance your performance. Experience the comprehensive benefits of our advanced vocal support formula and achieve a strong, healthy voice naturally.
shortDescriptionHtml: Support your vocal health with Success Chemistry's Slay Vocal Complete. Our natural formula with organic ingredients enhances vocal performance and supports lung and larynx health. 60 capsules per bottle.
supplementFacts:
Supplement Facts
Serving Size: 1 Scoop (4.1g)
Servings Per Container: 28

Amount Per Serving / %DV
Proprietary Lung & Larynx Blend 4,180 mg **
Organic Wheatgrass Whole Powder (Triticum aestivum) (leaf), Organic Moringa Leaf Powder (Moringa oleifera), Organic Inulin (Agave tequilana), Organic Red Beet Root Powder (Beta vulgaris), Organic Spinach Powder (Spinacia oleracea) (Aerial), Organic Broccoli Powder (Brassica oleracea) (crown), Organic Barley Grass Juice Powder (Hordeum vulgare) (Whole herb), Organic Spirulina Powder (Arthrospira platensis) (Whole Plant), Organic Kale Powder (Brassica oleracea) (leaf), Organic Coconut Water Powder (Cocos nucifera), Organic Matcha Tea Powder (Camellia sinensis) (Leaf), Organic Chlorella Powder (Chlorella vulgaris), Organic Turmeric Powder (Curcuma longa) (Root), Organic Lemon Juice Powder (Citrus limon) (fruit), Organic Ashwagandha Powder (Withania somnifera) (Root), Organic Flax Seed Powder (Linum usitatissimum), Bacillus Coagulans

** Daily Value (DV) not established

Other Ingredients: Natural Citrus Punch, Citric Acid, Organic Reb A Stevia, Natural Lime Flavor, Natural Bitter Blocker.
Distributed by: successchemistry.com
